name: KrkMETAL Page
body:
### Welcome to KrkMETAL page.
> Without music, life would be a mistake. (с) Friedrich Nietzsche



Hello! I'm Yaroslav Shukharev.


I’m a programmer and guitarplayer from Russia. 



***

I'm on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/KrkMETAL), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/krkmetal), [VK.com](http://vk.com/krkmetal) and [Google+](https://plus.google.com/u/0/104175333419116200703/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
